2. "Makers" by Cory Doctorow
   - Protagonist: Perry (nicknamed Sam)
   - Device: Creates various DIY technological innovations and 3D-printed inventions

3. "The Martian" by Andy Weir
   - Protagonist: Mark Watney (though not named Sam, he creates numerous ingenious homemade devices to survive on Mars)

4. "Little Brother" by Cory Doctorow
   - Protagonist: Marcus Yallow (creates homemade tech to fight government surveillance)

While not all of these perfectly match your exact request, they all feature protagonists creating interesting technological devices as a key part of the story. "Ready Player One" probably comes closest to matching your specific criteria.
